javadoc:
Data Creation service.

 NOTE: This version is dependant on the currentProgram of the implementing
 plugin class. If you want a version that is not dependant on it, please use
 DataCreationService

methods.name: isCreateDataAllowed
methods.comment:
Determine if create data is permitted on the specified location. If the
 location is contained within the current program selection, the entire
 selection is examined.

return.comment: true if create data is allowed, else false.

methods.name: createData
methods.comment: Apply the given data type at a location.

params.name: dt
params.comment: dataType to create at the location

params.name: enableConflictHandling
params.comment: if true, the service may prompt the user to resolve data conflicts

return.comment: true if the data could be created at the current location

name: DataService
comment:
Data Creation service.

 NOTE: This version is dependant on the currentProgram of the implementing
 plugin class. If you want a version that is not dependant on it, please use
 DataCreationService
